Articles.Content:
I know many of us has built spacecrafts that are from movies, the challenge is simple, build a spacecraft based on a spacecraft from a film/movie/tv series/etc.

1. Feel free to use any mods

2. Post a screenshot of the spacecraft you built and a picture of what the spacecraft was supposed to be

3. It doesn't have to be able to fly, but bonus points if it flies

4. More bonus points if it has a similar function/weapon/equipment to the spacecraft it was based on

5: Kerbalised name(optional)

6: Kerbalised backstory(optional)

I present to you my entry, the Bentenmaru from the anime Mouretsu Pirates.

It is equipped with a hyperjump drive, the sunbeam laser, the antennae from the remote tech

It couldn't get off the ground easily so I had to use the hyperjump to get it into orbit, then again, the Bentenmaru was a spaceship that can't fly in atmosphere.

Edited September 15, 2012 by Whatshtisthis

Oh man I wish I was good at building things like this... Would love to recreate some of the fighters/flagships from Descent Freespace...

http://starships.wikia.com/wiki/GTD_Orion

The Orion is the capital ship of the GTA. Measuring a frightening 2.1 kilometers in length, the cost to build one of these far outweighs the cost of paying the crew of this ship for 3 years. There is no more important symbol of Terran Pride than a ship like the Galatea or the Intrepid cruising past a colonized planet, patrolling the system and ensuring safety. In the course of the 14 year war, very few of these have ever been lost, making the destruction of an Orion a truly horrible defeat.

Using the old GTF Angel Scout Fighter as a template, the GTA created the Valkyrie Interceptor Fighter. It has two additional engines, as well as an additional set of primary hardpoints. This makes the Valkyrie the best bomber interceptor in the fleet. Its speed is unmatched in the GTA, and its maneuverability is above average. Its only drawbacks are a small secondary payload and weak hull.
